com.ea.orbit.actors

Interface IRemindable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IActor

    public interface IRemindable
extends IActor
    Actors that register reminders must implement the interface IRemindable.

    Reminders are a low frequency persisted timers that will be called even if the actor is not currently activated.

    Differences between timers and reminders:

    Timer Reminder
    Exists only during the activation Exist until explicitly cancelled by the application
    Can be high frequency, seconds and minutes Should be low frequency, minutes, hours or days
    Actor deactivation cancels the timer Reminder remains after deactivation.
    Receive a callback Call a fixed method
    Any actor can use timers Only actors whose interface implements IRemindable can use reminders

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task<?> receiveReminder(String reminderName, TickStatus status)
      Receive reminder will be called by the reminder subsystem.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ea.orbit.actors.IActor

        getReference, getReference

    • Method Detail

      • receiveReminder

        Task<?> receiveReminder(String reminderName,
                        TickStatus status)
        Receive reminder will be called by the reminder subsystem.
        Parameters:
        reminderName - the name of the registered reminder
        status - the current status of the reminder that triggered this call.
        Returns:
        an application task that might be completed asynchronously.
